text: Northern Story () is a 1960 Soviet drama movie directed by Yevgeni Andrikanis.Биография народного артиста России Анатолия ТороповаСЕВЕРНАЯ ПОВЕСТЬ It stars Oleg Strizhenov, Eva Murniece, and Valentin Zubkov. == Actors == * Oleg Strizhenov as Pavel Bestuzhev * Eva Murniece as Anna Jakobsen / Maria Jakobsen * Valentin Zubkov as Tikhonov * Gennadi Yudin as Shchedrin * Nikolai Svobodin as Kiselyov * Viktor Kulakov as Merk == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1960 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Northern Story
